ygData.subject: RE: Macroing skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Me dun have the ability to talk cock sing song la.  So any recommendation on which pool I can jump in macro swim whole night w/o bothering of getting drown?
ygData.messageBody:
Me dun have the ability to talk cock sing song la. So any recommendation
on which pool I can jump in macro swim whole night w/o bothering of getting
drown?

Also, anyone tried the fishing bot. If u set the macroing, how many rod or
bait do I need? Also can ths fish stack? If not how to carry so many
fishes and stuffs when I macro fish whole night?

Zil

On Friday, 16 July, 1999 1:37 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Swimming very easy for me to max up. Jump into a pond and sing the
stamina/mana
> song and viola! Max swimming skills.
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > I read from the net that tat are few wulu wulu places which allow us to
> > macro some skills like swiming.
> >
> > Some pools are so shallow that when we sleep, we can set our char auto
> > forward swiming. Thou stamina will drop, we will not drown when we
stop
> > swiming since the pool is shallow. I dunno those wulu wulu place
mentioned
> > but wonder any any kakis got lobang near FP? If yes I can leave my PC
on
> > and macro swimming. They say when u reach master swimmer, u can swim
> > faster than u run, LOL.
> >
> > FYI, fishing is another macro-able skills using the fishing bot.
> >
> > If there is any more macro-able skills, pls share share hor ;)
> >
> > Ziltus
